CustomField.description: As part of DCP-1298 for capturing the end user for the opportunity Automated/Manual.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Name of entity using product/solution; specific to location where solution/will be installed or relocated. Required through opportunity lifecycle; drives pricebook (direct channel). Changes to UC after Quote Approved invalidates Quote and changes stage to Denied.
CustomField.label: Ultimate Consignee
